_sText:
HEEEEEEEEEEEELO !! 

Welcome to : mg_escape_from_blackmesa

From here, my biggest project ! The map take me 1 mont to make, and lot of peple help me ! 

The map is big, 3 minutes of jump/triks and 70 MB.

It's a hard map, with lot of little FUCKING hard jump and trap (deadly, OFC)

I didn't spoil you more, have fun !
